description: Zuhura Solutions is an innovative initiative focused on creating smart street vending trolleys, known as the Hallease Trolley, to empower food vendors in Kenya. These trolleys utilize renewable energy, including solar power and ethanol, to provide a sustainable cooking solution while enhancing food safety and hygiene. By offering a pay-as-you-go model, Zuhura enables vendors to transition from charcoal to cleaner energy, ultimately improving their income and contributing to environmental sustainability.
name: Zuhura Solutions
